articles.title: The apple of Kashmir’s eye
articles.description: More and more farmers in Kashmir are switching from paddy to high-yielding apple varieties from Europe. This is boosting the rural economy and creating jobs, but there are also environmental concerns, reports Peerzada Ashiq

articles.description: India needs to expedite steps that can help minimise the impact of higher oil prices

articles.title: Anti-India, pro-India groups scuffle outside High Commission in London
articles.description: At several points, the Indian flag was torn by hand and shredded underfoot, and protesters on both sides traded slogans and insults.

articles.description: The Opposition leaders are likely to meet on January 29, the first day of the Budget Session, to discuss their floor strategy in the CJI issue.
